DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate response rate patient taxane-pretreated recurrent breast cancer receive paclitaxel load polymeric micelle ( Genexol-PM ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Paclitaxel Loaded Polymeric Micelle Patients With Taxane-Pretreated Recurrent Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Genexol-PM novel Cremophor EL-free polymeric micelle formulation paclitaxel . This single arm , multicenter phase IV study design evaluate response rate , toxicity , progression free survival tumor control rate Genexol-PM patient Taxane-pretreated recurrence breast cancer .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age > =18 year 2. WHO ( ECOG ) performance status 02 3 . Estimated life expectancy > =3 month 4 . Have give write informed consent available prolong followup 1 . Patients previous chemotherapy recurrent breast cancer 2 . Breast cancer recurrence within 12 month taxane treatment 3 . Her2/neu expression 4 . Patients malignancy ( breast cancer ) within last 5 year , except adequately treat situ carcinoma cervix basal cell , squamous cell carcinoma skin . 5 . Brain metastasis 6. uncontrolled infection , medically uncontrollable heart disease 7. serious medical illness prior malignancy 8 . Pregnant lactate woman exclude .
